embeds.title: 📜 Exton — Available Commands
embeds.description: Use these commands to detect scams and protect your community:

fields.name: 🆔 Oldnames
fields.value: `/oldnames` — View a user's past Twitter names.

fields.name: 🕵️ Scan
fields.value: `/scan` — Check a profile for scam reports.

fields.name: 📡 Monitor Add
fields.value: `/monitor add` — Track a Twitter account. *(Admin only)*

fields.name: 📌 How to Report
fields.value: Click the button below to submit a scam report.

footer.text: Need help? Contact the server admin.
